page.title: 16PLAYGROUND GAMES-MAINLY BOYS
page.content: {MARBLES}Small glass balls.Names:{moon- just one colour{grandad}coloured rings {emperor}the biggest{spider}tiny with lines in it{curly wurly}spirel shape{oily}metal{cats eyes}white with colours on{speckled eggs}spotted.Game 2 players roll marble to hole or pot. First in gets marbles.Or player 1 rolls marble anywhere,player 2 tries to hit it with his marble.l rolls his marble from where it landed to hit 2's First to hit gets marbles. {CONKERS } played in Autumn.Conkers, threaded on string,hit together until one breaks. Survivor called a oner,then a twoer.. {FOOTBALL}played all year.Sometimes football banned on playground then {HANDBALL}played with ball thrown instead of kicked.{STAG}boys stand at one end of playground except one.He has to try to catch someone as they run across.The captive then helps. v
